title: 11" MBA code
message: All works on this computer but it keeps throwing this code:   4sns/1/4000000:TB1T-0.000. Any idea? Think it's a temp sens... but the TP works fine.

title: 11" MBA code
message: Battery temp sensor. Is this a fake battery? Try another one, beware to use the correct model for the model year!

title: 11" MBA code
message: The battery is A1406 which I believe is the correct model for the mid 2012 11" airs. Any other sucggestions? If the customer just ran it despite the temp sensor, would it be detrimental?

title: 11" MBA code
message: A1406 is correct, replace the battery or just leave it if it works fine.
